overview: This digital download showcases 10 explicit short films inspired in confessions from the public, selected and directed by Erika Lust. Included: Boat Buddies With Benefits; A Weekend in the Garden of Eden; Take Me Drunk I'm Home; Romance Bullshit; Cinéma X; Hello, Pool Boy!; I Wish I Was a Lesbian; Fräulein O.; Rush of the Forbidden; El Que No Ama No Conoce A Dios.
tagline: A promise of adventure, an invitation to laugh, to breathe, to fuck... to LIVE!
title: XConfessions 3
